failed_checks.check_name: Ensure that SSH access is restricted from the internet
code_block:
resource "azurerm_network_security_group" "tf-ansible-sg" {
  name                = "${var.prefix}-sg"
  location            = "${var.location}"
  resource_group_name = "${azurerm_resource_group.terraform_ansible.name}"

  security_rule {
    name                       = "HTTP"
    priority                   = 100
    direction                  = "Inbound"
    access                     = "Allow"
    protocol                   = "Tcp"
    source_port_range          = "*"
    destination_port_range     = "80"
    source_address_prefix      = "*"
    destination_address_prefix = "*"
  }

  security_rule {
    name                       = "SSH"
    priority                   = 101
    direction                  = "Inbound"
    access                     = "Allow"
    protocol                   = "Tcp"
    source_port_range          = "*"
    destination_port_range     = "22"
    source_address_prefix      = "*"
    destination_address_prefix = "*"
  }
}

failed_checks.check_name: Ensure that HTTP (port 80) access is restricted from the internet
code_block:
resource "azurerm_network_security_group" "tf-ansible-sg" {
  name                = "${var.prefix}-sg"
  location            = "${var.location}"
  resource_group_name = "${azurerm_resource_group.terraform_ansible.name}"

  security_rule {
    name                       = "HTTP"
    priority                   = 100
    direction                  = "Inbound"
    access                     = "Allow"
    protocol                   = "Tcp"
    source_port_range          = "*"
    destination_port_range     = "80"
    source_address_prefix      = "*"
    destination_address_prefix = "*"
  }

  security_rule {
    name                       = "SSH"
    priority                   = 101
    direction                  = "Inbound"
    access                     = "Allow"
    protocol                   = "Tcp"
    source_port_range          = "*"
    destination_port_range     = "22"
    source_address_prefix      = "*"
    destination_address_prefix = "*"
  }
}

failed_checks.check_name: Ensure that instances are not configured to use the default service account
Ensure Compute instances are launched with Shielded VM enabled
Ensure 'Block Project-wide SSH keys' is enabled for VM instances
Ensure VM disks for critical VMs are encrypted with Customer Supplied Encryption Keys (CSEK)
Ensure that Compute instances do not have public IP addresses
Ensure Google compute firewall ingress does not allow unrestricted http port 80 access
Ensure that virtual machines are backed up using Azure Backup
Ensure that Microsoft Antimalware is configured to automatically updates for Virtual Machines
Ensure that Network Interfaces don't use public IPs
